Conseil.label: Consulting
Conseil.subtext: SOLWAY supports companies in their digital transformation.

Formation.label: Training
Formation.subtext: SOLWAY now offers the opportunity to train on SAP as well as other languages and frameworks.

Sourcing.label: Sourcing
Sourcing.subtext: SOLWAY helps you meet your recruitment needs by finding the right talents for your company.

Innovation.label: Innovation
Innovation.subtext: SOLWAY develops its own tools to simplify and improve your daily tasks.

Intégration.label: Integration
Intégration.subtext: SOLWAY assists in implementing your SAP solutions, especially in the HR module, and in other areas such as Linux, databases, and networks.

VERIF’DSN est un outil SAP qui permet de: VERIF’DSN is a SAP tool that allows you to check your DSN blocks before sending them to social security organizations and administrations. It is an easy, intuitive tool that is highly appreciated by payroll managers. Feel free to contact us for more information or to request a free trial.
VERIF’DSN PLUS est un outil complémentai: VERIF’DSN PLUS is a complementary tool to VERIF’DSN that allows you to control your DSN over multiple pay periods. This will enable you to easily and quickly perform quarterly, semi-annual, or annual checks of your contributions. For more information, please contact us, and we will be happy to answer your questions.
SOLWAY Synchronisation HR est notre solu: SOLWAY HR Synchronization is our solution to securely automate the synchronization of HR data.

SOLDESK.label: SOLDESK
SOLDESK.subtext: SOLDESK is an internal ticket management tool that efficiently handles client requests (bugs, enhancements, etc.) through a simple and fast interface.

SOLWAY HR.label: HR SOLWAY
SOLWAY HR.subtext: SOLWAY HR is a complete solution for optimizing human resource management, covering hiring, recruitment, payroll, and more.

SOLWAY INVOICE.label: SOLWAY INVOICE
SOLWAY INVOICE.subtext: SOLWAY INVOICE is an internal tool that simplifies invoicing by allowing easy entry of activity reports and automatic generation of invoices for end clients.

Vous etes Consultant SAP HR ?: Are you an SAP HR Consultant?
Rejoignez-nous pour découvrir nos opport: Join us to discover our unique opportunities and grow
avec nous, du stage au CDI débutant,: with us, from internships to entry-level CDI.
Fondée en octobre 2019, SOLWAY Consultin: Founded in October 2019, SOLWAY Consulting & Services aims to support you by providing its expertise in human resource management through SAP HR (HCM) solutions. With our team of experienced consultants, we offer personalized advice to optimize the management of your human capital and the performance of your HR processes.
Notre engagement envers l’excellence, la: Our commitment to excellence, rigor, and innovation allows us to offer solutions tailored to your specific needs, while taking into account the unique challenges of your organization. We place customer satisfaction at the heart of our approach, establishing a long-term partnership and ensuring the effective implementation of your SAP HR projects.
Avec SOLWAY Consulting & Services, vous: With SOLWAY Consulting & Services, you benefit from tailored support and recognized expertise to successfully transform your HR processes and achieve your efficiency and performance goals.
Nous sommes présents en France, à Colomb: We are present in France, in Colombes, and also in Morocco, in Rabat, which allows us to offer broad geographical coverage and meet the needs of our clients, regardless of their location.
Avec plus de 10 ans d’expertise, il a co: With over 10 years of expertise, he has contributed to numerous HR projects, helping to develop a strong and versatile expertise in human resource management.
Aujourd’hui, il participe à la mise en p: Today, he is involved in the implementation of HRIS solutions for our various clients.
Au titre de ses responsabilités, il déve: As part of his responsibilities, he develops our different branches: consulting, innovation, and training.
Notre partenariat avec l’éditeur SAP: Our partnership with the SAP publisher
Notre connaissance approfondie du progic: Our in-depth knowledge of the SAP software and the development of tools recognized by SAP has allowed SOLWAY to become a SAP Silver partner.
Nous utilisons des cookies pour améliore: We use cookies to improve your experience. By continuing to visit this site, you agree to our use of cookies.
N'hésitez pas à nous contacter pour plu: Feel free to contact us for more information.
Nous sommes à votre disposition pour rép: We are at your disposal to answer your questions.
et vous fournir les informations nécessa: and provide you with the necessary information for success.
Optimisez la gestion de vos DSN comme ja: Optimize the management of your DSNs like never before! Detect errors instantly, make the work of your payroll managers easier with quick and effective checks, and free up valuable time to focus on strategic tasks. With Verif'DSN, say goodbye to complications and hello to simplicity and performance!

selection_data.item1: Select the data source: A text file or B2A

VERIF’DSN PLUS est un outils complémenta: VERIF’DSN PLUS is a complementary tool to VERIF’DSN that allows you to control your DSN blocks over multiple payroll periods. With this tool, you can have a quarterly, semi-annual, or annual view of your contribution declarations. You can thus compare your annual declarations to your payroll results, similar to the N4DS period.
Un programme SAP intuitif et facile à ut: An intuitive and easy-to-use SAP program, fully customizable, that allows you to quickly and reliably synchronize employee IDs between two systems, thereby optimizing the efficiency and accuracy of processes.
Il est doté d’une interface utilisateur: It is equipped with a simple and user-friendly interface.
Vous avez la possibilité de paramétrer l: You have the ability to configure the infotypes to
Cet écran vous permet de sélectionner le: This screen allows you to select the employee IDs to synchronize.

Vous avez aussi la possibilité de choisi: You also have the option to choose the test mode and the anonymization of the employees to synchronize.
Il est sous forme d’une table ALV qui pe: It is in the form of an ALV table that allows the display of synchronization results by employee ID and by module.
SOLDESK est une plateforme de gestion de: SOLDESK is a ticket management platform that offers a comprehensive range of features to optimize the ticket processing workflow and improve collaboration within your team.
Suivez l’évolution des tickets en temps: Track the progress of tickets in real-time with full transparency at every step of the process.
SOLDESK vous permet de vérifier l’état d: SOLDESK allows you to check the status of your requests at any time, ensuring clear and immediate communication.
Grâce à ce suivi détaillé, les utilisate: Thanks to this detailed tracking, users can see exactly where their request stands and receive instant updates at each status change.
Facilitez les échanges entre les utilisa: Facilitate communication between users and ticket management responsible individuals with SOLDESK.
Notre plateforme permet aux clients de c: Our platform allows clients to communicate directly with the team responsible for their tickets when needed, ensuring a quick and personalized response. Additionally, managers and members of the ticket processing team can also exchange messages among themselves and with the entire team.
Cette communication bidirectionnelle et: This bidirectional and transparent communication ensures that all parties involved remain informed and can collaborate effectively to resolve requests.
Avec SOLDESK, la gestion des tickets est: With SOLDESK, ticket management is simplified and efficient. With just one click, you can easily create a ticket by filling out the necessary fields.
Vous avez également la possibilité de jo: You also have the ability to attach relevant files directly to the ticket.
Cette simplicité d’utilisation permet de: This ease of use saves time and ensures that all necessary information is immediately available, facilitating quick and accurate management of requests.

SOLWAY INVOICE est un outil de gestion d: SOLWAY INVOICE is an invoicing management tool designed to simplify and optimize the billing process. It offers a range of features to ensure smooth and efficient management of financial transactions.
Génération Facile du Compte Rendu d'Acti: Easy Generation of Activity Reports for Each User
Créez facilement des comptes rendus d'ac: Easily create activity reports for each user, providing a clear and detailed overview of transactions and financial performance.
Générez automatiquement des factures pro: Automatically generate professional and personalized invoices. Configure invoice templates and settings to automate the creation and delivery of invoices.
Suivez facilement le paiement des factur: Easily track invoice payments with real-time monitoring tools. Receive automatic notifications and reminders for pending invoices and upcoming payments.
Conscients de leur responsabilité envers: Aware of their responsibility toward charitable actions, SOLWAY employees founded the SOLWAY Association for Solidarity.
Nous priorisons l'accès à une éducation: We prioritize access to quality education for underprivileged children and provide financial support to the most disadvantaged to ensure their dignity. Together, we embody solidarity and commitment toward a more united Morocco.
Engagement Solidaire de SOLWAY pour un M: SOLWAY's Commitment to Solidarity for an Inclusive Morocco
Garantir des conditions de vie dignes pa: Ensure dignified living conditions through financial support.
Faciliter l'accès à l'éducation et à des: Facilitating access to education and educational resources.
Engagement Collectif pour un Maroc Solid: Collective Commitment for a United Morocco
Nos actions visent à accompagner et à so: Our actions aim to support and assist the local population in its development, with the ambition of fostering their gradual independence.
Notre principal objectif est d’apporter: Our main objective is to provide meaningful support to children living in difficult conditions to help them build a better future.
Nous nous engageons aussi à soutenir fin: We are also committed to providing financial support to the most disadvantaged individuals, enabling them to meet the minimum conditions for a dignified life.
Nous nous investissons fermement pour qu: We are deeply committed to ensuring that every child in vulnerable situations has the opportunity to access education by building or renovating schools in remote villages. By uniting our efforts, we firmly believe in each individual's ability to contribute positively to the development and well-being of our society. Together, we embody the values of solidarity and commitment for a united Morocco.
